actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize testimony by and representation of Members of the Senate in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings & Loan Securities Litigation.

summary.text: Authorizes Senator John Glen and Senator John McCain to testify in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings & Loan Securities Litigation, except when the attendance is necessary at the Senate and except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Senators in connection with their testimony in such case.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by and representation of Members of the Senate in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings & Loan Securities Litigation.
